content: **materials ** - size 10 cotton crochet thread - crochet hook size 6 **gauge ** rounds 1-3 = about 2 **errata** the instructions should read as follows round 4 typo … join with a slip_stitch to the top of the beginning chain 3 round 13 small part of the instructions is missing … repeat from * to * 6 times 3 double_crochet in the next chain 3 space chain 2 8 times double_crochet in the next chain 2 space yo insert hook in same space and … -> continue with the instructions as written
